_description: Command syntax for WiX and msiexec commands

cli_commands.name: /passive
cli_commands.description: Unattended mode - progress bar only, no user interaction

cli_commands.name: /q
cli_commands.description: Set user interface level

cli_commands.name: /a
cli_commands.description: Administrative install - extracts files to a network location

cli_commands.name: /f
cli_commands.description: Repair a product installation

cli_commands.name: /i
cli_commands.description: Install or configure a product

cli_commands.name: /j
cli_commands.description: Advertise a product

cli_commands.name: /p
cli_commands.description: Apply a patch (.msp file)

cli_commands.name: /x
cli_commands.description: Uninstall a product

cli_commands.name: /l
cli_commands.description: Enable logging

cli_commands.name: /forcerestart
cli_commands.description: Always restart after installation completes

cli_commands.name: /norestart
cli_commands.description: Suppress any restarts after installation completes

cli_commands.name: /promptrestart
cli_commands.description: Prompt user if a restart is required

cli_commands.name: wix build
cli_commands.description: Build WiX source files into installer packages

cli_commands.name: wix burn attach
cli_commands.description: Attach a Burn engine to a bundle

cli_commands.name: wix burn detach
cli_commands.description: Detach the Burn engine from a bundle

cli_commands.name: wix burn extract
cli_commands.description: Extract all payloads from a Burn bundle

cli_commands.name: wix convert
cli_commands.description: Convert WiX v3 source files to v4 format

cli_commands.name: wix extension add
cli_commands.description: Add a WiX extension to the cache

cli_commands.name: wix extension list
cli_commands.description: List installed WiX extensions

cli_commands.name: wix extension remove
cli_commands.description: Remove a WiX extension from the cache

cli_commands.name: wix format
cli_commands.description: Format WiX source files

cli_commands.name: wix msi decompile
cli_commands.description: Decompile an MSI package back to WiX source

cli_commands.name: wix msi transform
cli_commands.description: Create a transform (MST) file from two MSI files

cli_commands.name: wix msi validate
